Home » 29Dhs Dhammasaṅgaṇīpāḷi » 2 Niddesa » 2.3 Nikkhepakaṇḍa » 2.3.2 Dukanikkhepa » 2.3.2.10 Mahantaraduka
2.3.2.10.6 Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Niddesa
Nikkhepakaṇḍa
Dukanikkhepa
Mahantaraduka
Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
1201.
1897Katame dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā? Vedanākkhandho, saññākkhandho, saṅkhārakkhandho; kāyaviññatti vacīviññatti; yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ cittajaṃ cittahetukaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu āpodhātu rūpassa lahutā rūpassa mudutā rūpassa kammaññatā rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāro āhāro—  ime dhammā cittasamuṭṭhānā.
1202.
1898Katame dhammā no cittasamuṭṭhānā? Cittañca, avasesañca rūpaṃ, asaṅkhatā ca dhātu—  ime dhammā no cittasamuṭṭhānā.
